column5: WELL THERE WAS NO WAY IN HELL I WAS GOIN OUT DURING THE DAY ON SUNDAY!!! +15 BRINGS OUT EVERYONE!! SO JUST TO SHOW PHOTOZ YA CAN CATCH A STEEL IN THE NIGHT HERE YA GO!!!(8PM TILL 2AM) NIGHT FISHIN IS ALOT TOUGHER BUT NO CROWDS AND PEACE AND QUIET IS WELL WORTH IT  LOL       THE FISH WERE HIT PRETTY HARD ALL DAY AND I WASNT EXPECTING MUCH!!! THEY WERE SHY HITTING VERY LIGHTLY!! WENT 3/8  IM GONNA HAVE TO WATCH MY REARVIEW MIRROR MORE OFTEN!!! I THINK CLIFF AND CAROL WERE HOT ON MY TRAIL  LOL GOOD TO SEE YOU GUYS OUT!! ANY???
whats wrong with the second fish??

Nice fish once again.....did you go outside your house yesterday?+15....more like +3......  hehehe...I was down yesterday with a buddy of mind as well....it was packed with people but COLD.....we managed a couple each....  Jason
JUST THINK IT WAS THE ANGLE ON THAT PIC FISH!!  ANYTHING ABOVE ZERO AND ITS NUTS!! WAS FIGERATIVLY SPEAKIN  LOL
I can't handle the 3 to 4 guys a hole deal, so Im with you on that one CC, the evening time is much better. Cant wait till April 28, secret spot here I come!!!! YAHOOOO!!!

LOL...guess we didn't follow you to the right place then....cause we didn't catch anything.  Great job Scott...just tell me you didn't catch them where you saw us earlier that night!   We only stayed out another 1/2 hour after seeing you...the wind picked up and got cold...that and the crap was floating down river and had to dodge too many pieces of driftwood.  Nice work out there!
FUNNY IT WAS WHERE YOU WERE EARLIER AND I DIDNT KNOW IT WAS YOU  LOL
Oh yeah...just got off the phone with Carole....and she says...with the utmost respect..."I HATE YOU"  LOL.
tell her i love her too!! (i can read between the lines  lol) usually they start to move about an hr after you said you were leaving  lol patience game thats for sure  lol

Weird CC, I found the fish very agressive sunday evening, with myself going 1 for 3 and some others catching fish as well all in an hour (from about 6 30 till dark). Then I stepped in the creek sans boots, and called it a night!  NICE BOWS CC!  lol, sweet fishing
I'll let her know LOL...thanks for the tip btw....next time we'll just stick it out a little longer.  Later bro!
Nice catch! hmmm where can i buy some loose Steelhead roe? Clearly my Salmon roe is not working, skunked twice now. (2nd time, i learnt not every day the river will give me that "winter grn" colour)
Ã§ant buy uncured roe bro!!! its against the law!!!! jigs and pinky works well too!!
CC is right, but lots of bait stores carry cured loose roe...try Gagnon's in Oshawa...they had some cured trout roe the last time I was there.
